entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core Scaffold-DbContext error Invalid column name 'has_filter'. Invalid column name 'filter_definition'. #26165
  • Unable to load shared library 'e_sqlite3' exception with net6 rc1 and efcore Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite.Core 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.1 #26163
  • OnModelCreating null reference exception with inverted navigation properties #26162
  • Improve type mapping tests #26158
  • No result returned when using Include and there is an Owned Entity in the object graph #26157
  • Sugar for getting a migration script for just the last migration #26155
    Backlog
  • Command line option to add HasColumnName to every property on scaffolding #26154

Closed

  • Cosmos: Adding an un-owned related entity #25167
    6.0.0
  • Unexpected DropIndex() call generated in migration Up() method when dropping PK #24638
  • Literal generation fails for DateOnly/TimeOnly #26156
  • Cannot scaffold context with NetTopologySuite #26133
  • Warn when using a newer version of dotnet ef with old runtime (command specific) #25153
    6.0.0
  • Where is "HasColumnOrder"? #26145
  • Removing a migration adds a `(string)null` argument to all ToTable calls in the snapshot #26067
  • Globally Opt of out Tracking, but opt in for just one Entity #26135
  • Globally Opt of out Tracking, but opt in for just one Entity #26142
  • Table Splitting throws an exception in multi-table environment update #25388
    6.0.0
  • Data Annotation of Keyless Attribute on class can't override in Fluent API #24373
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Code cleanup for remaining product projects #26164
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26161
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0] Fix to #26084 - Query: SqlExpressionFactory doesn't apply type mapping to InExpression #26153

Merged

  • Cosmos: Set ValueGenerated.Never for most integer properties #26152
  • [6.0] Code literal support for DateOnly/TimeOnly #26159
  • [6.0] Fix SQL Server NTS scaffolding code generation #26160
  • [6.0] Tools: Warn/error when using new features on old runtimes #26127
  • [6.0] Code cleanup on EFCore project #26100
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26125
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Set ValueGenerated.OnUpdateSometimes when more than two properties share the same colum #26148
  • Throw a better exception for relationships to keyless entity types #26143
